Author: kitterfly
Text: I got a super light period by restricting for just a little and being SUPER stressed... hopefully you can get back to a place where you are getting it normally, but it's definitely worth checking things out with a doctor if you can even if it doesn't seem like a big deal

Author: TheManyArchetypes
Text: Your disordered eating patterns can certainly be an issue for your body, as can stress. So, if you are under stress and also restricting on top of it, your body may be taking it really hard.   I've missed periods due to certain life stressors like moving (independently of restricting food behavior) My period is also just lighter some months then others.   I know you said you don't want to go to the doctor, but I'm still going to reccomend it, because there could be a whole other medical issue going on too, and they are the only ones that can determine what the culprit is.
